metadata.name: Betamethasone Dipropionate 0 05 Minoxidil 5 Niacinamide 2 Pentoxifylline 0 5 400 mg Tablet delayed release

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of patients with intermittent lameness or immobility arising from chronic occlusive arterial disease of the limbs

contraindications.disease: LD sub 50 sub 1385 mg kg orally in mice
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Pentoxifylline a synthetic dimethylxanthine derivative structurally related to theophylline and caffeine is used in the treatment of peripheral vascular diseases and in the management of cerebrovascular insufficiency sickle cell disease and diabetic neuropathy
